ROM.Changelog: [*] android-7.1.1_r25 [*]OTA Updates support [*]Rootless Substratum support [*]Custom carrier label [*]OneHandMode [*]Custom battery styles [*]Statusbar Notification Ticker [*]Add back Navbar options to SystemUI Tuner [*]Fix alarm icon visibility issues in QS shade [*]Addressed a lot of BT issues [*]Disable app verification and enable third party app installs by default [*]Add support for Google Now and gestures in Launcher3 [*]Pixel navbar animation
